UICOMP students are able to remain on campus for their residency years, thus avoiding the disruption of relocation. Starting salary and benefits for first-year residents rank above the national average. ACGME-Accredited Residencies Emergency Medicine Family Medicine Internal Medicine Internal Medicine – Transitional Internal Medicine-Pediatrics Neurology Neurosurgery Obstetrics & Gynecology Pediatrics Psychiatry Surgery Diagnostic Radiology Independent IR/DR Residency UICOMP is affiliated with UnityPoint Health – Methodist and OSF Saint Francis Medical Center .
